item.title: BnaA9.WRKY47
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA09g00350D Gene Symbol: BnaA9.WRKY47 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 47 Genome: B.

item.title: CsiLAC17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs8g17630.1 Gene Symbol: CsiLAC17 Gene Name: Citrus LACCASE-17 Genome: Orange Genomic Database Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsiLAC4 and CsiLAC17 are predominantly localized in the apoplast of tobacco epidermal cells.

item.title: CsiLAC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs6g07800.1 Gene Symbol: CsiLAC4 Gene Name: Citrus LACCASE-4 Genome: Orange Genomic Database Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsiLAC4’s role in xylem lignification was determined by mRNA hybridization and cytochemistry.

item.title: FaPIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaPIP2|1 Gene Name: Water channel protein Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: FaPIP2|1|FaPIP2|1, an aquaporin subtype of PIP2 was cloned and its functional characterization in Xenopus oocytes determined.
